info.name: Pawazap
info.description:
This application is designed as a complete service delivery application for the pawazap platform with future extensions for the users' application, the examples that are shown in this documentation were done with `form-data` but `JSON` is the preferred means of data communication and JSON formatted requests are accepted. status code used in this project were 200, 201, 204, 400, 401, 403, 404, 405, 409, 422, 500, 503 as per the web development HTTP standard see: [https://httpstatuses.com/](https://httpstatuses.com/) Please note that the requests for empty contents will be replied with a 204 status code, which will show up as a success but empty on your request application. which can be best handled as shown below.

```
```
// No content response (204)
if (response.status === 204) { response.data = {data:{}}; }
```

```

request.description: Test if the user sms notification model is responsive

Log a user in

request.description: Log a user out

formdata.description: Required (Path to the rest password page on the front end)

request.description: Reset a user's password phase 1, this send's a password reset token and form with link to user.
Reset a user's password phase 2, this accepts a password reset token and new password from user.
Change a user's password
Submit token send to users email to verify users email
Check if a user is logged in

request.description: Test if the auth model is responsive
Get all the data stored in cache by the application

formdata.description: Required( Accepts a string in an array )
Required( Accepts a string in an array )

request.description: Clear a specific set of data stored in cache by the application
Test if the cache model is responsive
Approve a company by management, management can approve a company to begin operation.
Unapprove a company by mangagement, mangagement can unapprove a company from carrying out operations.

query.description: Acceptes Only boolean('1','0') (Optional, can be combined with properties)
Acceptes Only boolean('1','0') (Optional, can be combined with properties)

request.description: Get all application available compaines, categorized by approved or unapproved companies and with or without their relationships.
Filter companies (at least one parameter required)
Search for a company by their company details, companies that deliver food, parcels. Also search by their address, location, or name.
Show a specific company
Show a logged in user's company
Edit a company submitted details
Edit a company submitted details
Delete a company
Test if the company model is responsive
Test if the user sms notification model is responsive
Test if the user sms notification model is responsive
Quick test a specific function

item.name: Permissions

request.description: Assign an avaliable ability to a role
Retract an ability from a role
Get all application available abilities
